mapper.select: select UUID() AS id, am.*, g.`name`AS goods_name, IFNULL(mgc.num,0) AS before_num, IFNULL(hi.num,0) AS add_num, IFNULL(scg.goods_count,0) AS num, #{type} AS type, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_time from view_machine_goods am left join inno72_goods g on am.goods_id=g.id left join ( select machine_id,goods_id,sum(goods_count) goods_count from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id group by sc.machine_id,scg.goods_id ) scg on am.machine_id=scg.machine_id and am.goods_id=scg.goods_id left JOIN ( select machine_id,goods_id, sum(after_count-before_count) num from inno72_supply_channel_history hi where hi.after_count != hi.before_count AND LENGTH(hi.goods_id) >1 and DATE_FORMAT(hi.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') group by machine_id,goods_id ) hi on am.machine_id=hi.machine_id and am.goods_id=hi.goods_id left join inno72_machine_goods_count mgc on am.goods_id=mgc.goods_id and am.machine_id=mgc.machine_id and DATE_FORMAT(mgc.submit_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(CURRENT_DATE,interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
